quote.issued_shares_note: The number of issued shares has been adjusted for the announced rights issue of 1 rights share for every 1 existing share with an ex-date of 22 September 2025. The number of issued shares before the adjustment is 1,825,740,693 shares as at 31 August 2025.
quote.summary: Shin Hwa World Ltd, formerly Landing International Development Ltd, is an investment holding company mainly engaged in integrated resort business. The Company operates its business through three segments. The Integrated Resort Development segment is mainly engaged in investing in a resort named Jeju Shinhwa World in South Korea. The Segment is also engaged in the operation of theme parks, water parks, hotels, international retail operations and food and beverage facilities. The Property Development segment is engaged in the construction and sale of vacation apartments and villas. The Gaming Business segment is engaged in the operation of a casino known as Landing Casino in South Korea.
